name: Desolution
description:
Desolution is a singleplayer, first person puzzle game. Explore the mystic world and challenge your mind with puzzles while you discover and old civilization.

This is a student project, so it's greatly appreciated any feedback.

The game collects anonymous usage data in order to improve the experience. We don't collect any personal data. 

After you play the game, we encourage you to fill the game survey. You can access it through the ingame button, located on the bottom left of the main menu. Alternatively you can access the survey from here: https://forms.gle/ZKbYMXFjKghmwgDVA

Made by:

- Alberto Alegre Mora (Technical artist & Producer)

- Abraham Lopez Pamias (Programmer)

- Gerard Vélez Sánchez (Music & Sound Effects)

- Adrián Fuster Lorca (Game Design)

- Alex Sanchez Cordonet (Enviroment artist)

- Alejandro Téllez Rodríguez (Lead artist)

- Carlos Eduardo Douglas Velenzuela (3D Artist & Texture artist)
